title: What are some free and genuine data entry job sites? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are no “real” data entry jobs around, let alone legit and free to join ones. Most advertised data entry jobs, if not all, are just scams to part you from your hard earned money. Machine learning is advanced enough top collect that data which once was entered manually. You need to think about another way of making money.
You go to a company that’s hiring data entry operators and apply for a job.
